content: ** errata the first pdf published 25 11 2012 contains a pattern that says to cast on 93 st the right amount is 77 st an updated pdf has been published 26 11 2012 ** for our holiday in october we took a family trip to denmark and amongst other places we visited aalborg - more specifically mølleparken a beautiful park surrounded by great trees and magical light i was inspired and the result is the pattern for the danish forests cowl the cowl is knitted with fingering/sock weight yarn but could probably easily be knitted with both heavier and lighter yarn you can just adjust the pattern the amount of leaves in on row depending on how big you want it
